feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:37 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 09:40 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
